Sends the instructions to change the DocSpace owner.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["ownerId"],"type":"object","properties":{"ownerId":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the owner whose settings are being managed.","format":"uuid","example":"75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for managing the owner-specific settings.","title":"OwnerIdSettingsRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Message about changing the portal owner","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"The owner change instructions status.","format":"int32","example":1234},"message":{"type":"string","description":"The owner change instructions message.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The owner change instructions parameters.","title":"OwnerChangeInstructionsDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"OwnerChangeInstructionsWrapper"}}}},"400":{"description":"Owner's email is not activated"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Collaborator can not be an owner"}}}
